author: pburba
msg: Rename and make our implementation of apr_dir_make_recursive public.
The APR PTF we require for 1.2.x does not implement apr_dir_make_recursive,
but the latest PTF does.  This change just makes it clearer that we are using
our own implementation and facilitates building on boxes that have the latest
